page.title: 03A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: MY NAME IS ISOBEL AND I AM 11 YEARS OLD.I GET UP AT 7.00,WASH,THEN DRESS TO GO DOWN TO BREAKFAST.USUALLY I HAVE TOAST AND A CUP OF COFFEE.AFTER BREAKFAST I GET READY FOR SCHOOL.SCHOOL BEGINS AT 9.00,AND WE START THE DAY WITH AN ASSEMBLY.THE WHOLE SCHOOL GATHERS IN THE HALL TO SING HYMNS AND SAY THE LORDS PRAYER.EVERY MORNING WE HAVE READING, MATHS AND ENGLISH.AT PLAYTIMES I PLAY BASKETBALL OR ROUNDERS.WE HAVE A DINNER TIME FROM 12.00 TO 1.15.WHEN I GO HOME AT 3.45 PM,I CHANGE MY CLOTHES AND GO DOWN THE PARK TO PLAY MY JAZZ BAND MACE.
